about_the_game:
Football game with combination of management and play action. You will buy and sell players based on budget and skills. You will define the playing tactics and the line up.

  • Play a match in position or hang up your boots and just dedicate to manage the squad

  • Be good and finish in the top 2 and progress to the upper division

  • Select to play over all the geographical regions and national associations

  • Play the national cup and make the board and fans happy

This game is inspired by the 1990 Dino Dini masterpiece Player Manager

Game Start

Start in 3rd division. Evaluate your players from The Squad view. I wouldn't start immediately to buy or sell players. Select Match Of The Day on the main hub and select the players that will play the first match.

The main parts still under development are:

  • Gameplay: Implement Penalty shoot out at the end of a Cup Match draw

  • Gameplay: Implement Playing tactics (formation tactics is done)

  • Gameplay: Implement user play in position

  • Gameplay: improve camera management

  • Market: finish up buy/sell players

  • Market: complete the National Cup ending
